events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit me at all and I am very disappointed.
The system has categorized the customer's issue under the Refund cluster based on keywords related to refund and return.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket the customer purchased recently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear the jacket didn't fit. I'd be happy to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with the original tags for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still has all the original tags attached just as you requested.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund request, and you should receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and assistance. I appreciate the help and will consider ordering again in the future.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case regarding the refund for your jacket has been formally closed. Thank you for contacting our support team.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the refund experience and overall service quality.
